dt: {bc}a doctrine opposing governmental interference in economic affairs beyond the minimum necessary for the maintenance of peace and property rights

dt.t: argued that the problem with oil prices was too much {wi}laissez-faire{/wi}

dt: {bc}a philosophy or practice characterized by a usually deliberate abstention from direction or interference especially with individual freedom of choice and action

dt.t: the university has a policy of {wi}laissez-faire{/wi} regarding nonacademic student activities

et: French {it}laissez faire{/it}, imperative of {it}laisser faire{/it} to let (people) do (as they choose)
shortdef: a doctrine opposing governmental interference in economic affairs beyond the minimum necessary for the maintenance of peace and property rights
a philosophy or practice characterized by a usually deliberate abstention from direction or interference especially with individual freedom of choice and action

pt: {sc}tact{/sc} {sc}address{/sc} {sc}poise{/sc} {sc}savoir faire{/sc} mean skill and grace in dealing with others. {sc}tact{/sc} implies delicate and considerate perception of what is appropriate.
{sc}address{/sc} stresses dexterity and grace in dealing with new and trying situations and may imply success in attaining one's ends.
{sc}poise{/sc} may imply both tact and address but stresses self-possession and ease in meeting difficult situations.
{sc}savoir faire{/sc} is likely to stress worldly experience and a sure awareness of what is proper or expedient.

pt.t: the {it}savoir faire{/it} of a seasoned traveler

et: French {it}savoir-faire{/it}, literally, knowing how to do
shortdef: capacity for appropriate action; especially : a polished sureness in social behavior

dt: {bc}obligatory scene {bc}a plot element that is standard for a particular genre

shortdef: obligatory scene : a plot element that is standard for a particular genre
